articles.author: The Quint
articles.title: Bhima Koregaon: Day After Swamy's Death, Report Claims 'Proof' Planted in PC - The Quint
articles.description: Bhims Koregaon Case, Stan Swamy's Death: A report by an American forensic agency Arsenal Consulting has claimed that evidence was 'planted' on the computer of another activist Surendra Gadling also arrested in the case.
articles.content: Speaking to NDTV, Mark Spencer, President of Arsenal Consulting said, "For documents to be delivered over months and even years, is not something we have ever seen or heard of. An intrusion for that … [+848 chars]

articles.title: The sea caught fire this weekend, so maybe it’s time to stop drilling oil - Electrek.co
articles.description: After an (American) holiday weekend largely dedicated to setting things on fire, we think it’s relevant to note something that caught on fire this weekend that absolutely shouldn’t have: namely, the sea. Over the weekend, not only did a fire break out in the …
